title: The last time i saw paris 1954 [Colorized , 4K, 60FPS]

sources.title: The last time i saw paris 1954 [Colorized , 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: The last time i saw paris is a 1954 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @ https://colab.research.google.com/  Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing: https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS: https://rife-vfi.github.io  A.I. Upscaling to 4K: https://ffmpeg.org  GPU: Google Colab
